title: Suriname’s Economic Affairs Minister to Share Vision Built on Offshore Oil at Caribbean Energy Week (CEW) 2026
description: Suriname’s Minister of Economic Affairs, Entrepreneurship and Technological Innovation, Andrew Baasaron, will join Caribbean Energy Week (CEW) 2026 as a key speaker, where he is expected to offer insights into the country’s long-term strategy amid one of the most significant energy transitions in it...
